issue.title: [PYTHON] Update description of File System Interfaces
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7564](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7564). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In [doc of File System Interfaces](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/filesystems.html), we can use pyarrow to connect not only Hadoop File System(HDFS) but also its compatible File System (Such as Apache Ozone).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7564?focusedCommentId=17343397) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
The current docs detail the various available filesystem kinds (S3, etc.).
